sentences.sContent: It is not enough that ecclesiastical men abstain from violence and rapine and all manner of persecution.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is not enough that ecclesiastical men abstain from violence and rapine and all manner of persecution.
sentences.sCn: 仅仅教士自身放弃暴力和掠夺以及所有迫害的方式还是不够的。

trans.tranOther: the seizure of property by force; pillage
